mapper.insert: insert into enterprise_tb(enterprise_name, password, salt, address, contact, email, size, sector, created_at) values(#{enterpriseName}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{address}, #{contact}, #{email}, #{size}, #{sector}, now())
mapper.update: update enterprise_tb set password = #{password}, salt = #{salt}, address = #{address}, contact = #{contact}, email = #{email}, size = #{size},sector=#{sector} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select salt from enterprise_tb where enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName}
select * from enterprise_tb where enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName} and password = #{password}
